resources.string: Government Polytechnic, Gondia is one of the premier institutions in Vidarbha region in Maharashtra State and started in Naxal affected area in 2009 which is run by Government of Maharashtra. At its commencement the intake was 240. At present annual intake of the institute is 360. This institute aims to develop the eminent engineers who are competent and committed to the highest professional standards in the field of engineering and technology.
